title: Fit&Me - Fitness Mobile Application
body: Developed a mobile application that is easy to navigate and includes a detailed collection of workouts. Users can create customized workout calendars by adding routines to their favourite’s list. I have also integrated BMI computation with projection based on the user’s entered height and weight, which enhances overall fitness tracking within the app.

title: JH hotel - Hotel Booking Website
body: Constructed a modern-looking website that enables guests to view various rooms, make and manage reservations, and edit their account information. The front end was built using HTML, CSS, and jQuery while the back-end operations were done using PHP and phpMyAdmin for database management.
